sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS versionsTables(id_table INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,name_table VARCHAR(80),last_update VARCHAR(50),numreg INTEGER);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS address_clients(id_address_client INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,co_address_client VARCHAR(30),tx_address_client VARCHAR(250),email_client VARCHAR(80),na_responsible VARCHAR(150),nu_phone VARCHAR(180),nu_phone2 VARCHAR(180),zipcode VARCHAR(30),tx_reference_point VARCHAR(80),coordinates VARCHAR(150),id_client INTEGER,id_country INTEGER,id_enterprise INTEGER);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS clients(id_client INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,co_client VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,na_client VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,lb_client VARCHAR(30),nu_rif VARCHAR(30),na_email VARCHAR(250),id_list VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,id_distribution_channel VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,id_payment_condition VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,id_zone VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS currencies(id_currency INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_currency VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, na_currency VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS distribution_channels(id_distribution_channel INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_distribution_channel VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, na_distribution_channel VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, id_enterprise INTEGER NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS document_sale_types(id_document_sale_type INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_document_sale_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, na_document_sale_type VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, id_enterprise INTEGER NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS document_sales(id_document_sale INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_document_sale VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, da_document_sale TIMESTAMP, da_duedate TIMESTAMP, nu_amount_base NUMERIC, nu_document VARCHAR(50), tx_comment VARCHAR(200), co_original VARCHAR(50), qu_duedate TIMESTAMP, nu_amount_discount NUMERIC, nu_amount_tax NUMERIC, nu_amount_total NUMERIC, nu_balance NUMERIC, id_client INTEGER, id_document_sale_type INTEGER, id_currency INTEGER, id_enterprise INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS lists(id_list INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_list VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, na_list VARCHAR(100), id_enterprise INTEGER);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS price_lists (id_price_list INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_price_list VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, nu_price NUMERIC, id_product INTEGER, id_list INTEGER, id_currency INTEGER,id_enterprise INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS payment_conditions(id_payment_condition INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_payment_condition VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, na_payment_condition VARCHAR(100), id_enterprise INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS product_lines(id_product_line INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_product_line VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, na_product_line VARCHAR(100), id_enterprise INTEGER);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS products(id_product INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_product VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, na_product VARCHAR(100), qu_stock INTEGER, image VARCHAR(500), activo BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0, id_unit INTEGER, id_product_line INTEGER, id_enterprise INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS units(id_unit INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, na_unit VARCHAR(100), id_enterprise INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS product_units(id_product_unit INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_product_unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, qu_unit VARCHAR(100), id_product INTEGER, id_unit INTEGER, id_enterprise INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS zones(id_zone INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, co_zone VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, na_zone VARCHAR(100), id_enterprise INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global_configuration(id_config NUMBER, clave VARCHAR(100), valor VARCHAR(100), descripcion VARCHAR(100))
